body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Kevin Bryant and the customer's name is Sara White.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Thank you for contacting Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Kevin Bryant. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Kevin, I'm Sara White. I'm just feeling a bit overwhelmed with choosing my first motorcycle.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, Sara. Choosing your first motorcycle can be quite a journey. May I ask how long you have been considering getting a motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I’ve been thinking about it for about six months now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That’s great to hear! And do you have a specific budget in mind for your motorcycle?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I was hoping to keep it under five thousand dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Understood! That gives us a lot of good options to explore. Could you please share your email address with me to send you some recommendations?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Sara! And just to confirm, could you also provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it’s three zero three, five five five, one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you so much for sharing that, Sara. I will compile some options for you and send them over shortly. Thank you for your time today, and I hope you have a great day!
